tools.pattern-search.title: Pattern Search
tools.pattern-search.description: Search byte patterns in binary data
tools.pattern-search.dropHint: Drag and drop a file here or click to upload
tools.pattern-search.wildcardHint: Tip: In Hex mode, use ?? as wildcard to match any byte
tools.pattern-search.aboutDesc: Pattern search tool is used to find specific byte sequences in binary data. Supports hexadecimal patterns (with wildcards), ASCII text, and regular expression search. Commonly used in reverse engineering to locate specific data structures, strings, or code fragments.
